en.how_it_works: Who we are & what we offer;
en.how_it_works_desc:
We are a team that helps you get your own professional CV site, without technical knowledge, without stress, and at an affordable price.

At FlexFolio, we combine low cost with professional quality.

It's time to get your own professional CV site.
Through just a few simple steps, you can customize it the way you want.
